      • executeSync

        public static int executeSync(StringBuilder errorLog,
                              StringBuilder infoLog,
                              String cmdExec,
                              boolean withEnvFile)
                       throws CredibilityException
        Execute the commands in parameters and log.
        Parameters:
        errorLog - the error log string builder
        infoLog - the info log string builder
        cmdExec - the commands to execute
        withEnvFile - execute with environment file
        Returns:
        the return code of the process
        Throws:
        CredibilityException - if an error occurs during CF variable parsing
